title: Knowledge Context Protocol Manifest
description: Schema for knowledge.yaml â€” a KCP manifest describing the knowledge units in a project. See https://github.com/Cantara/knowledge-context-protocol/blob/main/SPEC.md

kcp_version.description: Version of the KCP specification this manifest conforms to. RECOMMENDED. Current valid value: "0.1".

project.description: Human-readable name of the project or documentation site. REQUIRED.

version.description: Semver version of this manifest. Increment when units are added or removed. RECOMMENDED.

updated.description: ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) when this manifest was last modified. RECOMMENDED.

units.description: Ordered list of knowledge unit declarations. REQUIRED. Must contain at least one unit.

unit.description: A self-contained piece of knowledge in the manifest.

id.description: Unique identifier within this manifest. Lowercase ASCII letters (a-z), digits (0-9), hyphens (-), and dots (.) only. Must not be empty.

path.description: Relative path from the manifest file's location to the content file. Forward slashes must be used as path separators. Must not start with '/' or contain '..' traversal that escapes the root.

intent.description: One sentence describing the question this unit answers or the task it enables. Written as a question or task description, not a title.

scope.description: Breadth of applicability: global (entire project), project (specific project/service), or module (specific module/component).

audience.description: Who this unit is for. One or more of: human, agent, developer, architect, operator, devops. Unknown values are silently ignored.

validated.description: ISO 8601 date when a human last confirmed the content was accurate. RECOMMENDED.

depends_on.description: IDs of units that should be loaded before this one. Values must be IDs declared in the same manifest. Cycles are detected and silently ignored.

supersedes.description: ID of the unit this replaces. The referenced unit may no longer exist in the manifest.

triggers.description: Keywords or short phrases indicating when this unit is relevant. Used for task-based retrieval. Each trigger must not exceed 60 characters. A unit must not declare more than 20 triggers.

kind.description: Type of artifact: knowledge (default), schema, service, executable, or policy. Extension field from RFC-0001.

relationship.description: An explicit directional relationship between two knowledge units.

type.description: The type of relationship: enables (from unlocks to), context (from provides context for to), supersedes (from replaces to), contradicts (from conflicts with to).
